name: Thor-os
body:
Welcome to thor-os website
=======

Thor is a minimalistic hobbyist operating system I'm writing to learn more about operating systems.

It is a 64bit OS written C++. It is accompanied by a bootloader written in assembly that loads the kernel from floppy. 

## License ##

note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
